text: Sharon Begley (June 14, 1956 â€“ January 16, 2021) was an American journalist. She was the senior science writer for Stat, a publication from The Boston Globe. She regularly contributed articles to the Yale Scientific Magazine while at University. She was born in Englewood, New Jersey and died on January 16, 2021 in Boston, Massachusetts at the age of 64. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American journalists Category:Writers from Boston Category:People from Englewood, New Jersey Category:Writers from New Jersey
title: Sharon Begley
